name: Pyrrhic Victory
description:
My first game. Made for TriJam166. Sadly, took 6 hours instead of 3.  The theme was weapon upgrade. All bugs are features.

A/D for left and right, enter for continue, spacebar for shoot. Once your ball hits the opponent, it becomes hazardous to you, until then it can bounce off you. Glitchy AF, but so am I.

Art is originally by John Leighton (15 September 1822 – 15 September 1912). Scanned from a physical book and then processed in Adobe Photoshop. Public domain.

Background texture is a scan of a handmade notebook I've had since childhood.

Game developed by Hazel and eHawk
